## Welcome to the Research Methods Course

This course is designed to prepare third-year undergraduate students for their dissertations in their fourth and final year.

This course is part of the undergraduate program at [Your University Name]. For more information, visit our [GitHub repository](https://github.com/YOUR_GITHUB_USERNAME/research-methods-course).
